short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark Alert: Stay organized with reminders for bookmarked sites. Never miss important pages again!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever bookmarked a site, only to lose track of it in your sea of tabs? Introducing Bookmark Alert â€“ now, alongside bookmarking a tab, set reminders to revisit it. Never miss crucial deadlines again with Bookmark Alert!
